53795.summary: Some customers in the & Huntington Hills areas of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Television  services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53795.title: Sept 30 - Calgary ( & Huntington Hills) | Television Services - Outage (Resolved)
